title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies in Practice: Mathematical Thinking Using Concept Maps in Technology-Enhanced Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level mathematics foundations and basic digital tool competency
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can construct concept maps with 85% accuracy in given mathematical problem situations to visualize relationships between core concepts.
Learners can share concept maps with peers using collaboration tools and perform iterative revisions (≥3 cycles) based on feedback.
Based on concept map creation, learners can analyze and explain complex mathematical problems with ≥70% solution accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
